SEARCH
Module makao
Package makao.model.game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
makao.model.game.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
Player class is responsible for representing a player in a game. It holds the player's hand, chosen cards, rounds to stay and nick.
See Also:

    • getNumberOfCards

      public int getNumberOfCards()

    • checkStateOfWaiting

      public void checkStateOfWaiting(StateOfRound stateOfRound)
      Method checks the state of waiting for the player. If the player has rounds to stay, it decrements the roundsToStay by 1
      Parameters:
      stateOfRound - the current state of the round

    • checkStateOfRequests

      public void checkStateOfRequests(StateOfRound stateOfRound)
      Method checks the state of requests for the round. If the round has requests, it decrements the roundsOfRequests by 1
      Parameters:
      stateOfRound - the current state of the round

    • areChosenCardsCorrect

      public boolean areChosenCardsCorrect(StateOfRound stateOfRound)
      Method checks if the chosen cards are correct to be played It checks if the size of chosenCards is not 0 and if all the chosen cards have the same CardValue
      Parameters:
      stateOfRound - the current state of the round
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the chosen cards are correct

    • playChosenCards

      public void playChosenCards(StateOfRound stateOfRound, DeckOfCards deckOfCards)
      Method plays the chosen cards If the last card is a jack or an ace, it adds all other cards to the stack and plays the last card Otherwise, it plays all the chosen cards
      Parameters:
      stateOfRound - the current state of the round
      deckOfCards - the current deck of cards

    • putBackChosenCards

      public void putBackChosenCards()

    • takeDrewCards

      public void takeDrewCards(Card firstCard, StateOfRound stateOfRound, DeckOfCards deckOfCards, AceListener aceListener, JackListener jackListener)
      Method takes in a Card, StateOfRound, DeckOfCards, AceListener, and JackListener and adds the card to the player's hand. It also iterates cardsToDraw number of times and draws a card from the deck, checking if it is an Ace or Jack card and setting its listener accordingly. The method also sets the possible next cards and cards to draw to 0.
      Parameters:
      firstCard - The first card to add to the player's hand
      stateOfRound - The current state of the round
      deckOfCards - The deck of cards to draw from
      aceListener - The listener for Ace cards
      jackListener - The listener for Jack cards

    • waitRounds

      public void waitRounds(StateOfRound stateOfRound)
      Method takes in StateOfRound, decrements the roundsToStay by 1 and sets the roundsToStay to 0 and sets the possible next cards to CardValue.ANYCARD.
      Parameters:
      stateOfRound - The current state of the round

    • hasPlayerWon

      public boolean hasPlayerWon()
